response.title: At Home Ovulation Double Check Test
response.tagline: New in home urine progesterone test for women to take control of their health and fertility.

latest_updates.text:
Huge thank you! Due to your support, Ovulation Double Check tests entered the market 7 months ago. If you have used our tests and are enjoying them, please consider leaving a product review.

Click this link to leave a product review:

https://www.amazon.com/review/create-review?asin=B06WD4CRLZ

If for any reason you are unhappy with your tests, please let us know. Thanks again, your support means so much to us!

Thanks,

The MFB Fertility team,

info@mfbfertility.com

response.title: Ecomo: The First Bottle That Tests & Filters Water
response.tagline: Shake to test, twist to filter: A Smart Bottle that helps you to get rid of contaminants

latest_updates.text:
...(Continued from today's previous update)

 

Our professional engineers are involved in supervising the final assembly process.

Photo of assembly process

 

Photo of Monitoring Modules

After all the steps are complete comes the final inspection of the monitoring modules. It might sound simple, but our engineering team has spent a tremendous amount of time and effort bringing this project to life. We’ve heard that creating an innovative product is a nerve-racking process, yet bringing an innovative, high-quality product to market is even more challenging.

 

I sincerely hope this update has succeeded in sharing our progress and joy with you. However, it’s not over yet; we are still running tests and seeking the best way to seal the segregation between the filtered and unfiltered water.

 

Thank you all again for your continued support and patience as we bring this to life. We know it’s been a long journey—thanks for sticking with us! In the meantime, we welcome your comments and question.

 

Warmly,

Ecomo

Warmly,

response.title: EyeQue Personal Vision Tracker smartphone eye test
response.tagline: World's first at-home vision testing and tracking technology. No appointment, no hassle.

latest_updates.text:
Hello everyone!

We are happy to announce that we have shipped ALL orders placed before April 26. This means over 1200 miniscopes are now either in the hands of or on their way to reaching over 900 IndieGoGo backers. Tracking numbers were emailed to each backer; if you did not receive yours or need any additional help, please let us know by emailing us at: support@eyeque.com.

For those who ordered on or after April 26, we are in the process of shipping out your miniscopes today! Stay tuned for your tracking information!

Once again, we could not have done this without YOUR support. THANK YOU so much!!!

Love, EyeQue Team

*******************************************************

Check out some cool projects from our friends:

Revolar: This Step Counter Has Your Back: ENDING TODAY!!!

Revolar Instinct is a wearable step counter that can send for help at the click of a button.

You deserve to feel safe and connected when you’re going out for a walk, a run, or a night on the town. That’s why Revolar created Instinct. It can quickly let your loved ones know your GPS location and if you’re safe, scared, or in an emergency. That way, you can get any help you need at the click of a button. Instinct ships in May. Check it out here.

JUISIR: Zero Cleaning, Maximum Juice

JUISIR is an innovative cold press juicer requiring no cleaning.

latest_updates.text:
Just to let you know, the work on the crossbow is probably going to start in 1-2 months, unless Tod runs into a delay. He has a backlog of orders, and of course his work is very time consuming.

I'm hoping that I'll be able to test it before the end of the year.

response.title: Learn, Build, Test and Fly RC airplanes
response.tagline:
Entering to RC hobby - The easy way
How to make RC airplane at home - video tutorials.

latest_updates.text:
Well, first of all, Big thank you for my new backers.

Let's do some updates :)

Scratch built Funtana Mini 3D RC airplane and covered with standard covering film. Great flyer and so easy to make. Little modification on wings, used KFm 4 air foil.

If you want 3D trainer model, this is it.

And it is so easy to make.

 

Link to plans:

https://www.rcgroups.com/forums/showpost.php?p=20767826&postcount=415

response.title: TESTING GRETA: An Unusual Story Of Domestic Abuse
response.tagline: TESTING GRETA is a surprising short film that tackles the nature of consent

latest_updates.text:
Dear TESTING GRETA backers,

It's taken a couple of months, but we've finally finished the film and are ready to submit to festivals. To see how we've been getting on, check out our teaser trailer on YouTube.

Once again thank you for your generous contributions. We couldn't have got there without you.

Abbie and Billie.

latest_updates.text:
Production Update: Shipment delay

Hello everyone

We are all excited that it is getting close to manufacturing and shipping.Our package is ready now, we cannot wait to see the final package being manufactured at a factory!!Now we would like to share an unfortunate news.Our production has been going well as we planned; however, we are finding out that some of authorization tests such as FCC, will take much longer than we expected at the beginning. Therefore, to be safe, we would like to delay our shipment date to be in early June instead of April which was our original schedule.Our sincere apology for this delay, we will try to have these authorization tests done as fast as possible, and start shipping BLINCAM to you soon.
latest_updates.html:
Production Update: Shipment delay

Hello everyone

We are all excited that it is getting close to manufacturing and shipping.
Our package is ready now, we cannot wait to see the final package being manufactured at a factory!!
Now we would like to share an unfortunate news.
Our production has been going well as we planned; however, we are finding out that some of authorization tests such as FCC, will take much longer than we expected at the beginning. Therefore, to be safe, we would like to delay our shipment date to be in early June instead of April which was our original schedule.
Our sincere apology for this delay, we will try to have these authorization tests done as fast as possible, and start shipping BLINCAM to you soon.
